name: The Girl, Wisp, and a Dream
name_original: The Girl, Wisp, and a Dream
description:
(**THE WINDOWS VERSION IS MORE RESPONSIVE THAN HTML VERSION**)
(**Download link below**)

A platformer game without the traditional controls, and health!(For GMTK 2018)

Millie, a little girl who dreams to go out on an adventure! However she can’t as she isn’t able to walk
One night before she went to bed, she wished that she could have an adventure even if it's just in a dream...

Control(s): 
LMB/ Touch : to move the wisp.
Take note of your remaining energy when moving Millie!

Time limit before Millie wakes up: 9pm~7am!

*Don’t go into the Abyss(dark part)or something bad will happen!
*Avoid scary enemies! (Time increases when you die to enemies)
*Move away from Millie to regain energy
*The closer you are to Millie, the more powerful your push
*Randomized levels!

Now go and guide Millie in her dream!

Characters:
Millie = Little Girl
Prince = Wisp

Credits:
John Silva(Klovis) - Programmer (Unity)
Umicasa- Millie, Wisp, Logo
